critique: The document is an executive order approving the Plastering and Lathing Contracting Chapter of the Code of Fair Competition for the Construction Industry. The tone is formal and legalistic. The primary emotion the President wants to elicit is a sense of confidence and stability in the construction industry. There is a sense of joy that the act is approved. There is no indication of sadness, anger, fear, or disgust. There is a slight sense of surprise that the act is approved.
